meanings.sent1: He rerigs his toy car with a new paint job.
meanings.sent2: She rerigs her outfit for the party by adding a sparkly belt.
meanings.sent3: The magician rerigs his trick to surprise the audience.
meanings.sent4: The mechanic rerigs the engine to make it run smoother.
meanings.sent5: The chef rerigs the recipe by adding a secret ingredient.

meanings.definition: The act of rigging again or differently.
meanings.sent1: The rerigs of the sail made the boat faster.
meanings.sent2: The rerigs of the stage were necessary for the new play.
meanings.sent3: The rerigs of the costume made it look even more extravagant.
meanings.sent4: The rerigs of the system improved its efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The rerigs of the rules brought a fresh perspective to the game.
